subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said he was not sure if his ailing back would allow him to play in the Masters, which is two weeks away. The Masters is the only major tournament Woods, 38, has never missed.
snippet: Tiger Woods said he was not sure if his ailing back would allow him to play in the Masters, which is two weeks away. The Masters is the only major tournament Woods, 38, has never missed.
